segments.text: I usually get a lot of information on the computer and use E-mail to send messages to my friends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me too.Recently , I'm fascinated with net-chat . I've made many friends on the net.Every day I talk to them and share many interesting things with them . I really enjoy it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't you think it ' s a sheer waste of both time and money ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid not . Every coin has two sides . I think using internet has a great deal to do with human interaction .
segments.speaker: S2
